name: SynchronyHOMETourismConcierge
0:
”Alexa, ask Home Tourism where is the best place to eat?”
”Alexa, ask Home Tourism what sights should I see?”
”Alexa, ask Home Tourism where are the best places to stay”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home tourism
Developer Terms of Use
des:
On behalf of The Synchrony HOME Tourism Bureau, we are thrilled to introduce you to your brand new personal concierge. Here to advise you on all of the rich experiences Home has to offer, Alexa can help you explore must-see sights, enjoy can’t-miss entertainment, and indulge in much-needed relaxation — all from the comfort of your own house. 

Of all the places you visit, Home should be the best. And that of course starts with you — how you design and take care of your space makes all the difference in making every day feel like vacation. But for now, take part in the local couch culture and sit back while we help you to discover the bountiful lands of Home: The Ultimate Destination.

This skill is for entertainment purposes, and not intended for cardholder servicing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
